All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminController
This class represents the RESTful API controller for the Admin functionalities.
AuthController
The AuthController class represents the RESTful API controller for handling user authentication.
EmailService
The EmailService interface defines the contract for sending emails.
EmailServiceImpl
The EmailServiceImpl class is an implementation of the EmailService interface.
JwtAuthenticationController
The JwtAuthenticationController class handles the authentication-related endpoints for the application.
JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint
The JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint is responsible for handling authentication errors during the JWT authentication process.
JwtRequest
The JwtRequest class represents a request object used for JWT authentication.
JwtRequestFilter
The JwtRequestFilter class is a filter that intercepts incoming requests and processes JWT authentication.
JwtResponse
The JwtResponse class represents the response object containing the JWT token.
JwtTokenUtil
JwtTokenUtil is a utility class for handling JSON Web Tokens (JWT) in a Spring Security context.
JwtUserDetailsService
The JwtUserDetailsService class implements the UserDetailsService interface from Spring Security.
LoginRequest
The LoginRequest class represents a login request sent by the client.
MyController
The MyController class represents a RESTful API controller that handles various endpoints related to user roles and authorization.
PaperGenraterCodeApplication
The PaperGenraterCodeApplication class is the entry point for the application.
Question
The Question class represents a question entity in the system.
QuestionController
The QuestionController class represents the RESTful API controller for managing questions.
QuestionOption
The QuestionOption class represents an option selected for a question.
QuestionRepository
The QuestionRepository interface is responsible for interacting with the database and performing CRUD operations on the Question entity.
QuestionService
The QuestionService interface defines the operations that can be performed on questions.
QuestionServiceImpl
The QuestionServiceImpl class implements the QuestionService interface and provides the implementation for managing questions.
Subject
The Subject class represents a subject entity in the system.
SubjectController
The SubjectController class represents the RESTful API controller for managing subjects.
SubjectRepository
The SubjectRepository interface is a repository for managing Subject entities.
SubjectService
The SubjectService interface provides methods for managing subjects.
SubjectServiceImpl
The SubjectServiceImpl class implements the SubjectService interface and provides the implementation for managing subjects in the system.
Test
The Test class represents a test entity in the system.
TestController
The TestController class handles HTTP requests related to tests.
TestCountResponse
The TestCountResponse class represents a response object containing the count of active tests and total tests.
TestRepository
The TestRepository interface is responsible for performing database operations related to the Test entity.
TestResult
The TestResult class represents the result of a test taken by a user.
TestResultController
The TestResultController class represents the RESTful API controller for managing test results.
TestResultRepository
The TestResultRepository interface extends the JpaRepository interface and provides methods for performing CRUD operations on TestResult entities.
TestResultService
The TestResultService class provides implementation for managing test results.
TestResultService
The TestResultService interface defines the contract for performing operations related to test results.
TestService
The TestService interface defines the contract for performing operations related to tests.
TestServicesImpl
The TestServicesImpl class implements the TestService interface and provides the implementation for managing tests.
User
The User class represents a user entity in the system.
UserDetails
The UserDetails class implements the Spring Security UserDetails interface and represents the details of a user for authentication and authorization purposes.
UserDto
The UserDto class represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for the User entity.
UserNotFoundAdvice
The UserNotFoundAdvice class is a global exception handler for the UserNotFoundException.
UserNotFoundException
The UserNotFoundException is an exception that is thrown when a user with the specified ID is not found.
UserRepository
The UserRepository interface extends JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations for User entities.
UserService
The UserService interface provides methods for managing user-related operations.
UserServiceImpl
The UserServiceImpl class implements the UserService interface and provides the implementation for managing user-related operations.
WebSecurityConfig
The WebSecurityConfig class is responsible for configuring the web security of the application.
